summary.p:
The bundle (35-3227) palm leaf manuscript has two different texts in telugu script. The title and author of both texts are not indicated anywhere in the manuscript. But, the first text contains the śabdakhaṇḍa of the Tattvacintāmaṇi of Gaṅgeśopādhyāya. The śabdakhaṇḍa has many sub divisions, of which titles are mentioned for a few in the left corner of the manuscript. For example:
4th folio: jaranmīmāmsakapakṣaḥ,
8th folio: Prābhākara siddhāntaḥ,
11th folio: ākānkṣāvādaḥ,
16th folio: padādhyāhāraḥ,
18th folio: tātoaryavādaḥ
19th folio: āsattivādaḥ
34th folio: ucchannaśākhāvādaḥ.
The manuscript has the complete text of the śabdakhaṇḍa in 55 folios.
The second text has 1-16 folios. It is an untitled text which appears like commentary on the Śaktivāda of the Tattvacintāmaṇi. He established the Naiyāyika's view, rejecting the Mīmāṃsaka's view.

msItem.title: Tattvacintāmaṇi - Śabdakhaṇḍa
msItem.author: Gageśopādhyāya
msItem.incipit: atha śabdaḥ nirūpyate | prayogahetubhūtārthatattvajnānajanyaḥ śabdaḥ pramāṇam
msItem.explicit: anyathā niyame pi niyamāntarāpekṣāyām anavasthiteḥ | āgamo py anumeyārthaṃ saṃvadatītikṛtaṃ prasaktānuprasaktyā

msItem.title: Śaktivāda commentary
msItem.incipit: nanv ārthavādikaṃ kvacit phalam ity asaṃgatam | arthavādānāṃ siddhārthaparatayā prāmāṇyābhāvāt | kāryānvita eva padānāṃ śaktyavadhānāt | tathā hi | vṛttivad iti | śābdatvaṃ kāryānvitaviṣayakavṛttena vā vidhiśo nirṇāyikānāṃ niṣedhād iti | praābhākarāṇāṃ vidhiśabdatvaprāpakatvāt prameyatvavad iti prayogaḥ niṣedhe tu śābdatarāvṛttitvāt | vṛttivaditi prayogaḥ |yadvā śabdaḥ kāryānvitānubhāvako na veti vipratipattiḥ athavā kāryānanvitaviṣayakatvaṃ śābdaniṣṭhābhānapratiyogi na veti vipratipattiḥ. atra kaścit jātimātraṃ padaśakyam ity abhyupagacchatā prābhākareṇa na tu kāryānvitaśaktivādaḥ kathaṃ saṃgacchata ity aprasaktireva kāryānvitaśaktivādasyeti dūṣaṇam āha tadasat | kāryānvitasyaiva padaśaktiviṣayatvam iti dūṣaṇenānabhidhānāt | kiṃ tu padaśaktiviṣayo jātimātram eva padajñānajanyatāvacanakaṃ tu kāryānvitajñānatvam ity anubhavānukūlo śabdaḥ
msItem.explicit: vastutas tu jātiviśeṣavato ghaṭāder avayavasaṃyogarūpākṛtiḥ ghaṭapadaśakyeti maṇikārā-bhipretārthaḥ | ata eva ākṛteḥ śakyatve pṛthivipadaśravaṇādipadādau anugatākṛterabhāvāt kathaṃ śaktir ity api dūṣaṇaṃ parāstam | sarvatrākṛteḥ śakyatvānabhidhānena uktadoṣāsaṃbhavāt ghaṭādipadaśakyatāvacchedakaṃ tu saṃsthānaviśeṣasamānādhikaraṇaghaṭatvaṃ na tu saṃsthānam | ghaṭatvaṃ ca pratyekaṃ nāpravṛttinimittakatvena nānārthatāpātāt | na ca niyāmakābhāvena ghaṭatvasamānādhikaraṇapadasthānavatvam astv iti vācyam | ghaṭatvasya ghaṭaviśeṣasya sākṣātsaṃbandhasyaiva vinigamakatvāt | evaṃ piṣṭakamayyo gāvaḥ ity atra lakṣaṇā yujyate gavām avayavasaṃyogarūpākṛtir evoktarītyā gopadaśakyatvāt tasya ca piṣṭake abhāvāt | ata eva piṣṭakasaṃyogaviśeṣāśakyatvād iti maṇir api | tasmāt jātiviśeṣa-vato'vayavasaṃyogaḥ śakya ity eva jyāya iti pratibhāti | jātiviśeṣavad iti dṛṣṭāntatāyāṃ vatir iti kecit | evaṃ ca jātyākṛtivyaktānāṃ pratyekaṃ śakyatvam iti bhramastyājyaḥ | anantaśaktyāpatteḥ | samūhālambanasyāpy āpatteś ca | kiṃ tu jātyākṛtiviśiṣṭe ekaiva śaktiḥ | ata eva paramarṣiḥ bhagavān sakalatantrārthavettā vyaktyākṛtijātyoḥ padārtha ity ekavacanāntarbhāvena sūcayanto vānā sūtrayed iti saṃkṣepaḥ |
